column4: is it specifically ubuntu or all of debian, or indeeda ll of linux....    for this firefox slowness?  it's ridiculously ugly/slow zooming a page or switching tabs or anything... but only on my ubuntu box.  not my xp or vista machines
How can I slower or scroll the boot messages at startup ? dumpfile only possib ?
:  i've seen other people complain.   what i mean is when i zoom a page, it gets graphically very ugly, compared to doing the same page on windows.  and takes a LOT longer to complete the zoom too
